### 2.  Use the df data frame.  Plot ratio by hwy.
 Sampling temperature: 0.1
```{R}


# Create new column
df$ratio <- df$cty / df$hwy

# Plot histogram
hist(df$ratio)

#-----------------


# Create a scatterplot of ratio by hwy
plot(df$hwy, df$ratio, xlab = "Highway Miles Per Gallon", ylab = "Ratio", main = "Ratio by Highway Miles Per Gallon")
```
